name: Leather Journal No. 3
description:
Handbound journal covered in medium brown leather with a bit of antique Japanese striped indigo. Crafted in the USA. Perfectly portable and sized for daily use. Fill with tiny words and favorite quotes, sketches and water-colorings, dried florals and feathers, memories from travels near and far. 

Measures: 6 x 4 x 1 in / 15.24 x 10.16 x 2.54 cm / 192 pages.

Inside you'll find linen tape, thread, ph neutral adhesive, headband, and Strathmore smooth drawing paper (suitable for graphite pencil, colored pencil, pen & ink, and marker). 

Made to order and ships within 1 to 2 weeks. More often much sooner.

name: Leather Journal No. 8
description:
Handbound journal, shown covered in an antique leather hide from Morocco with a bit of antique Japanese indigo. Crafted in the USA. Perfectly pocket-sized and great for keeping numbers and to do lists, small sketches, and tiny text. 

Measures: 4 x 3 x 1/2 in / 10.16 x 7.62 x 1.27 cm / 96 pages.

Inside you'll find linen tape, thread, ph neutral adhesive, headband, and Strathmore smooth drawing paper (suitable for graphite pencil, colored pencil, pen & ink, and marker).

Made to order and ships within 1 to 2 weeks. More often much sooner.
